privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.introText: This policy applies to the DrawAndGuess web game, including room play, chat, drawing sync, sharing, and reference-image features. You can play without creating an account.
privacy.dataCollectionText: To keep the game working and stable, we process:
privacy.dataPoint1: Basic info such as nickname, room ID, and language preference
privacy.dataPoint2: Gameplay data such as strokes, chat messages, round scores, and room state
privacy.dataPoint3: Technical data such as IP address, browser type, and access time
privacy.dataPoint4: Traffic metrics such as page visits and basic usage events
privacy.dataUsageText: We only use data for service operation and improvement:
privacy.dataUsagePoint1: Run real-time multiplayer sessions and synchronize game state
privacy.dataUsagePoint2: Troubleshoot issues, prevent abuse, and improve performance
privacy.dataUsagePoint3: Understand feature usage and prioritize product iteration
privacy.cookiesText: We use browser storage (for example, to remember language preference) and may use analytics-related cookies to measure site usage.
privacy.thirdPartyText: Some features rely on external services:
privacy.thirdPartyPoint1: Google Analytics: site traffic and basic behavior analytics (if enabled)
privacy.thirdPartyPoint2: DeepSeek API: trending word generation on the server side
privacy.thirdPartyPoint3: Image search proxy: AI reference image display
privacy.retentionText: Real-time room data is primarily stored in server memory and is cleared when a room becomes empty. It is also reset on server restart. Analytics data may be retained for operations analysis.
privacy.rightsText: You can stop using the service at any time by leaving the page. If you want to request access, update, or deletion of relevant data, please contact us via the Contact page.
privacy.contactText: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please

about.title: About Us
about.missionText: DrawAndGuess is a lightweight real-time multiplayer drawing game designed for quick starts and instant social interaction.
about.storyText: The current version includes room creation/joining, real-time drawing sync, chat guessing, round scoring, room sharing, AI reference images, and bilingual support (English/Chinese).
about.teamText: We focus on mobile-first usability, low-latency synchronization, and clear game rules that are easy to learn.
about.roadmapText: We will continue improving gameplay stability, anti-abuse controls, internationalization, and live-ops features for global players.
